text: 6.7: 1 Ko 2.4; 2 Ko 10.4; Ef 6.11-13; 2 T 4.7Nza guigira buni guarira bun nzuav, nza Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋkar panan ŋgari. Nza tɨvar vhuuŋ, nza ntari ga mbui bigɨna suigi fara muuŋgiap, ana wari won guva haren ana suirav, vhɨra anan wari won ŋkɨn haren ana suirigi. Nza ana suirav, Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara mbuav, Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara nzuav shogi.
